name: orbitale/translation-bundle
description: Adds database management for Symfony2's native translator, a db to files translations extractor, a translation catcher whenever id or source is not found, and a translation UI to manage it.

suggest.javiereguiluz/easyadmin-bundle: Useful to add a simple back-end interface to manage your translations with EasyAdminBundle
